title: Google Pixel 1 crash and blue screen
content:
Hi guys! I recently purchased a Google Pixel 1 and in the first few months of use it gave a blue screen and simply crashed):
I do not know what to do! There is no assistance anywhere and I have tried everything. I downloaded Android recovery apps but all only support Samsung.
Would anyone know how to help me? Any way you could get it back?
Thanks in advance! I'm from Brazil.
